title: I have boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com bookmarked
body: So can someone tell me why it automatically sets the region thing to NA if I am going to OCE fucking annoying.

replies.body:
That's weird... where are you from?
Have you tried to clear your cache and cookies?
yeah that happens to me randomly not every time though. Top left changing it back to Oceanic fixes it

Hi RainbowWindslash,

One issue might be that the region depends on what website domain you were last on na.leagueoflegends.com or oce.leagueoflegends.com.

If you were on na.leagueoflegends.com then go to boards.na or boards.oce your region will be set to NA
If you were on oce.leagueoflegends.com then go to boards.na or boards.oce your region will be set to Oce

Let me know if this works for you

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=goTiacVx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-11T23:44:33.234+0000)
> Hi RainbowWindslash,
> 
> One issue might be that the region depends on what website domain you were last on na.leagueoflegends.com or oce.leagueoflegends.com.
> 
> If you were on na.leagueoflegends.com then go to boards.na or boards.oce your region will be set to NA
> If you were on oce.leagueoflegends.com then go to boards.na or boards.oce your region will be set to Oce
> 
> Let me know if this works for you

Yeah that seems to be it, will this issue be fixed soon™?
We are aware and working on the issue, soon™ =)
